publicApplicationId: synoDM is download manager app for synology NAS servers. For proper functionality you have Download Station enabled in Control Panel of your Synology DSM.
description: This is a test app for a new category being developed. Please disregard.
versionNote:
0.6.6 - DSM 4.X compatibility (you can use DSM 3.X too), new login screen, bugfixes
0.6.3 - added paging in task and details list, added details mode - ability to manage files in download task, touchpad optimization
0.6.0 - full TouchPad version (back/cancel buttons, fullscreen), paging in search results, ability to filter search results by categories, fixed adding url via search input field (http:// in url required)
0.5.8 - revamped search ability, lot of bug fixes, added autologin feature, code optimization
